channel.title: Help!
channel.description: I´ve been wondering that can I play someones moparscape server in offline. Like Foxscape cos in rs2 I only have a f2p and i´ve always wanted to go to members only places, try their skilles, use their weapons and armours and all that... So is it possible?

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @uppit uppit
item.description:
@uppit wrote:

you cant play other peoples servers offline, but if you make one + download a client then you should be able to play it offline

Read full topic
